alert.note: Alert for Greeley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 09 at 6:57PM CDT until May 09 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 041... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 041... * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley. * Winds...Along and south of Highway 96, winds will be from the southwest at 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. North of Highway 96, winds will be from the east northeast at 15 to 25 mph. On Tuesday, expect southeasterly to southerly winds at 15 to 25 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 to 15 percent. * Impacts...Extreme and unpredictable fire behavior. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
info.instruction: Avoid outdoor burning. Repeating, outdoor burning is not advised today and Tuesday. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
